  • Council Committees

About Meetings

The City Council meets every Tuesday at 6 p.m. in the Council Chambers on the second floor of City Hall, 2201 University Blvd. Council committees meet Tuesday afternoons beginning at 2:30 p.m. in various conference rooms in City Hall. Occasionally, special meetings are called and these agendas are posted separately.

Notice of Meetings

All meetings of the City Council are open to the public with the exception of Executive Sessions as defined by the Alabama Open  Meetings Act
